person.persName: John Slavens, Jr. (Mercer County school teacher)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of John Slavens and Sophia Slavens. Resident in Mercer County in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1850. Resident in Harrodsburg in 1860. Household owned three enslaved persons in Harrodsburg in 1860.
